Name
====

**setup-client** - client setup with authoritative DNS server

Description
===========

The resolver(3) uses resolv.conf(5) to access Internet Domain Name System (DNS).

Assuming local authoritative DNS server runs on IP `10.0.1.2`:

```console
% cat /etc/resolv.conf
# Generated by resolvconf
search lab.net
nameserver 10.0.1.2
```
